title: Pedantic Player

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Every time the host makes a host error, you are informed of exactly what happened. You may then gain one use of your choice of the following: a Basic attack, a Basic autovest, or a vote that counts as three.
- You may reroll this role for free if you think the host is competent.

desc:
Post 547
*Akshually, because of how priority works...*
